targets.expr: (cpqDaPhyDrvSize{hostname="$node"}) + on (cpqDaPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqDaPhyDrvLocationString) (cpqDaPhyDrvLocationString{hostname="$node"}) + on (cpqDaPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqDaPhyDrvModel) (cpqDaPhyDrvModel{hostname="$node"})  + on (cpqDaPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqDaPhyDrvSerialNum) (cpqDaPhyDrvSerialNum{hostname="$node"})

(cpqSasPhyDrvSize{hostname="$node"}) + on (cpqSasPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqSasPhyDrvLocationString) (cpqSasPhyDrvLocationString{hostname="$node"}) + on (cpqSasPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqSasPhyDrvModel) (cpqSasPhyDrvModel{hostname="$node"})  + on (cpqSasPhyDrvIndex) group_left(cpqSasPhyDrvSerialNumber) (cpqSasPhyDrvSerialNumber{hostname="$node"})

(cpqHoFwVerDisplayName{hostname="$node"}) + on (cpqHoFwVerIndex) group_left(cpqHoFwVerLocation) (cpqHoFwVerLocation{hostname="$node"}) + on (cpqHoFwVerIndex) group_left(cpqHoFwVerVersion) (cpqHoFwVerVersion{hostname="$node"})  + on (cpqHoFwVerIndex) group_left(cpqHoFwVerCategory) (cpqHoFwVerCategory{hostname="$node"})
